questions.question: machine networks for one shot learning
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT paperid FROM paper WHERE title  =  "machine networks for one shot learning";

questions.question: which states border the state with the smallest area
questions.gold_sql: SELECT border FROM border_info WHERE state_name  =  ( SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE area  =  ( SELECT MIN ( area ) FROM state ) );

questions.question: What datasets have jitendra malik used
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.datasetid FROM paper AS t3 JOIN paperdataset AS t2 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "jitendra malik";

questions.question: Find the ids and first names of the 3 teachers that have the most number of assessment notes?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.teacher_id ,  T2.first_name FROM Assessment_Notes AS T1 JOIN Teachers AS T2 ON T1.teacher_id  =  T2.teacher_id GROUP BY T1.teacher_id ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 3

questions.question: In which buildings are there at least ten professors?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT building FROM Faculty WHERE rank  =  "Professor" GROUP BY building HAVING count(*)  >=  10

questions.question: Find the name of the activity that has the largest number of student participants.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.activity_name FROM Activity AS T1 JOIN Participates_in AS T2 ON T1.actID  =  T2.actID GROUP BY T1.actID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: Show the product type and name for the products with price higher than 1000 or lower than 500.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT product_type_code ,  product_name FROM products WHERE product_price  >  1000 OR product_price  <  500

questions.question: which state has the greatest population
questions.gold_sql: SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE population  =  ( SELECT MAX ( population ) FROM state );

questions.question: Which paper did Richard Ladner present at chi ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM venue AS t4 JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Richard Ladner" AND t4.venuename  =  "chi";

questions.question: which states does the ohio run through
questions.gold_sql: SELECT traverse FROM river WHERE river_name  =  "ohio";

questions.question: who has papers at NIPS ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid FROM venue AS t3 JOIN paper AS t2 ON t3.venueid  =  t2.venueid JOIN writes AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t3.venuename  =  "NIPS";

questions.question: How many female Professors do we have?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT count(*) FROM Faculty WHERE Sex  =  'F' AND Rank  =  "Professor"

questions.question: Find the total revenue created by the companies whose headquarter is located at Austin.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT sum(revenue) FROM manufacturers WHERE headquarter  =  'Austin'

questions.question: Show the names of all the activities Mark Giuliano participates in.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T3.activity_name FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Faculty_participates_in AS T2 ON T1.facID  =  T2.facID JOIN Activity AS T3 ON T3.actid  =  T2.actid WHERE T1.fname  =  "Mark" AND T1.lname  =  "Giuliano"

questions.question: Who cites Daniel A Reed most ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( t4.citingpaperid )  ,  t3.authorid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t2.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citingpaperid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Daniel A Reed" GROUP BY t3.authorid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citingpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: What papers have Peter Mertens and Dina Barbian written ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens" AND t1.authorname  =  "Dina Barbian";

questions.question: how many papers has Christopher D. Manning written ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t2.paperid ) FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Christopher D. Manning";

questions.question: Who has coauthored with Noah A Smith ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Noah A Smith";

questions.question: how tall is the highest point in delaware
questions.gold_sql: SELECT highest_elevation FROM highlow WHERE state_name  =  "delaware";

questions.question: What papers has Richard Ladner written at chi ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM venue AS t4 JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Richard Ladner" AND t4.venuename  =  "chi";

questions.question: convolution papers by brian curless
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid  ,  t3.paperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t5 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t5.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "brian curless" AND t5.keyphrasename  =  "convolution";

questions.question: What are the different reviewer names, movie titles, and stars for every rating where the reviewer had the same name as the director?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT T3.name ,  T2.title ,  T1.stars FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID JOIN Reviewer AS T3 ON T1.rID  =  T3.rID WHERE T2.director  =  T3.name

questions.question: How many co-authors has Mark Steedman had ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT COUNT ( DISTINCT t1.authorid ) FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname != "Mark Steedman" AND t2.paperid IN ( SELECT t2.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Mark Steedman" );

questions.question: What is the paper about convolution from brian curless ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid  ,  t3.paperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t5 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t5.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "brian curless" AND t5.keyphrasename  =  "convolution";

questions.question: what is the largest state that borders the state with the lowest point in the usa
questions.gold_sql: SELECT t1.state_name FROM highlow AS t3 JOIN border_info AS t1 ON t3.state_name  =  t1.border JOIN state AS t2 ON t2.state_name  =  t1.border WHERE t3.lowest_elevation  =  ( SELECT MIN ( lowest_elevation ) FROM highlow ) ORDER BY t2.area DESC LIMIT 1;

questions.question: What are the titles of all movies that were not reviewed by Chris Jackson?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT title FROM Movie EXCEPT SELECT T2.title FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID JOIN Reviewer AS T3 ON T1.rID  =  T3.rID WHERE T3.name  =  'Chris Jackson'

questions.question: How many products are there for each manufacturer?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT count(*) ,  T2.name FROM products AS T1 JOIN manufacturers AS T2 ON T1.Manufacturer  =  T2.code GROUP BY T2.name

questions.question: Who are Noah A Smith 's co-authors
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Noah A Smith";

questions.question: Show last names for all student who are on scholarship.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.Lname FROM Sportsinfo AS T1 JOIN Student AS T2 ON T1.StuID  =  T2.StuID WHERE T1.onscholarship  =  'Y'

questions.question: What are the names and average prices of products for manufacturers whose products cost on average 150 or more?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT avg(T1.Price) ,  T2.name FROM products AS T1 JOIN Manufacturers AS T2 ON T1.manufacturer  =  T2.code GROUP BY T2.name HAVING avg(T1.price) >= 150

questions.question: List all academic papers on machine networks for one shot learning
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT paperid FROM paper WHERE title  =  "machine networks for one shot learning";

questions.question: Which students have professors as their advisors? Find their student ids.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.StuID FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Student AS T2 ON T1.FacID  =  T2.advisor WHERE T1.rank  =  "Professor"

questions.question: what datasets are used in papers by jitendra malik
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.datasetid FROM paper AS t3 JOIN paperdataset AS t2 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "jitendra malik";

questions.question: Where does Peter Mertens publish ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid  ,  t4.venueid FROM venue AS t4 JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens";

questions.question: what state is salem the capital of
questions.gold_sql: SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE capital  =  "salem";

questions.question: Select the name of each manufacturer along with the name and price of its most expensive product.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T1.Name ,  max(T1.Price) ,  T2.name FROM products AS T1 JOIN Manufacturers AS T2 ON T1.manufacturer  =  T2.code GROUP BY T2.name

questions.question: give me the number of rivers in idaho
questions.gold_sql: SELECT COUNT ( river_name ) FROM river WHERE traverse  =  "idaho";

questions.question: Datasets with semantic parsing information
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.datasetid FROM paperdataset AS t3 JOIN dataset AS t2 ON t3.datasetid  =  t2.datasetid JOIN paperkeyphrase AS t1 ON t1.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN keyphrase AS t4 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t4.keyphraseid WHERE t4.keyphrasename  =  "semantic parsing";

questions.question: List ids for all student who are on scholarship.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT StuID FROM Sportsinfo WHERE onscholarship  =  'Y'

questions.question: how many cities does the usa have
questions.gold_sql: SELECT COUNT ( city_name ) FROM city;

questions.question: What articles have been published since 2006 about the effects of juicing for cancer patients ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT paperid  ,  title FROM paper WHERE title LIKE "the effects of juicing for cancer patients" AND YEAR  >  2006;

questions.question: What is the reviewer id of Daniel Lewis?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT rID FROM Reviewer WHERE name  =  "Daniel Lewis"

questions.question: Find the first and last name of the faculty who is involved in the largest number of activities.
questions.gold_sql: SELECT  T1.fname ,  T1.lname FROM Faculty AS T1 JOIN Faculty_participates_in AS T2 ON T1.facID  =  T2.facID GROUP BY T1.FacID ORDER BY count(*) DESC LIMIT 1

questions.question: List papers that has keyword Question Answering
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Question Answering";

questions.question: what is the population of california
questions.gold_sql: SELECT population FROM state WHERE state_name  =  "california";

questions.question: which papers in acl 2012 had Parsing in them ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Parsing" AND t3.year  =  2012 AND t4.venuename  =  "acl";

questions.question: how many inhabitants does boulder have
questions.gold_sql: SELECT population FROM city WHERE city_name  =  "boulder";

questions.question: what state has the largest population density
questions.gold_sql: SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE density  =  ( SELECT MAX ( density ) FROM state );

questions.question: how many states border the state with the largest population
questions.gold_sql: SELECT COUNT ( border ) FROM border_info WHERE state_name IN ( SELECT state_name FROM state WHERE population  =  ( SELECT MAX ( population ) FROM state ) );

questions.question: What authors wrote papers about Bacterial Wilt in 2016 ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.authorid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t1 JOIN keyphrase AS t2 ON t1.keyphraseid  =  t2.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t1.paperid JOIN writes AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.paperid JOIN author AS t5 ON t3.authorid  =  t5.authorid WHERE t2.keyphrasename  =  "Bacterial Wilt" AND t4.year  =  2016;

questions.question: Who are Noah A Smith 's coauthors
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t1.authorid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Noah A Smith";

questions.question: papers written by Peter Mertens and Dina Barbian
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM writes AS t3 JOIN author AS t2 ON t3.authorid  =  t2.authorid JOIN writes AS t4 ON t4.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t4.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t2.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens" AND t1.authorname  =  "Dina Barbian";

questions.question: Euclidean Distance papers citing NIPS papers
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t5.citingpaperid FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN cite AS t5 ON t2.paperid  =  t5.citingpaperid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t5.citedpaperid JOIN venue AS t4 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "Euclidean Distance" AND t4.venuename  =  "NIPS";

questions.question: What are the names of companies with revenue less than the lowest revenue of any manufacturer in Austin?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT name FROM manufacturers WHERE revenue  <  (SELECT min(revenue) FROM manufacturers WHERE headquarter  =  'Austin')

questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t2.paperid FROM writes AS t2 JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "sharon goldwater";

questions.question: 2014 papers using ImageNet
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.paperid FROM paperdataset AS t2 JOIN dataset AS t1 ON t2.datasetid  =  t1.datasetid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid WHERE t1.datasetname  =  "ImageNet" AND t3.year  =  2014;

questions.question: What are the titles and directors of all movies that have a rating higher than the average James Cameron film rating?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT T2.title ,  T2.director FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID WHERE T1.stars  >  (SELECT avg(T1.stars) FROM Rating AS T1 JOIN Movie AS T2 ON T1.mID  =  T2.mID WHERE T2.director  =  "James Cameron")

questions.question: in what venues does Peter Mertens publish ?
questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t3.journalid  ,  t4.venueid FROM venue AS t4 JOIN paper AS t3 ON t4.venueid  =  t3.venueid JOIN writes AS t2 ON t2.paperid  =  t3.paperid JOIN author AS t1 ON t2.authorid  =  t1.authorid WHERE t1.authorname  =  "Peter Mertens";

questions.gold_sql: SELECT DISTINCT t4.citedpaperid  ,  COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) FROM paperkeyphrase AS t2 JOIN keyphrase AS t1 ON t2.keyphraseid  =  t1.keyphraseid JOIN paper AS t3 ON t3.paperid  =  t2.paperid JOIN cite AS t4 ON t3.paperid  =  t4.citedpaperid WHERE t1.keyphrasename  =  "parsing" GROUP BY t4.citedpaperid ORDER BY COUNT ( t4.citedpaperid ) DESC;

questions.question: When did Peter Mertens and Dina Barbian collaborate ?

questions.gold_sql: SELECT count(*) FROM company
